TITLE: Consumer confidence in housing finally rises, thanks to falling home prices
SUMMARY: Consumer confidence in the U.S. housing market is improving slightly, as mortgage rates settle and home prices fall.

TITLE: Sweden is facing its ‘day of reckoning’ as house prices plummet
SUMMARY: This downturn is not surprising given the "dysfunctional" nature of the market, according to Stefan Ingves, the former governor of Sweden's central bank, the Riksbank.

TITLE: Mortgage refinance demand surges, as homeowners take advantage of lower interest rates
SUMMARY: Mortgage rates fell last week, causing a rush on refinancing.

TITLE: China's reopening is set to boost Hong Kong's property market as retail leads the recovery: Colliers
SUMMARY: In light of China's reopening and easing of Covid rules, Hong Kong's property market will be on a path to recovery in 2023, according to Colliers Hong Kong.

TITLE: The condo king of Miami bets his new Fisher Island luxury project can weather a recession
SUMMARY: Jorge Perez and his Related Group are behind the 10-story, 50-unit Fisher Island project that boasts a sell-out price of $1.2 billion.
